resources.string: WELCOME!!! Rule of the game: You are given a word to guess then you supply a letter after another. You only have 6 tries. If you guessed the word without expiring your 6 tries, then you win. Otherwise, if you consumed all your tries, you lost. Okay, good luck and enjoy! Please press MENU below. Thank You! - (This is just a sample text to show. ;-D) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
